name: Tower Miners
description: Tower Miners is a local multiplayer game. Mixed out of strategy, tower defense and random party game genre.The goal is to beat your enemy by destroying his base.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or newer Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2 GHz+ or newer Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
